title: A paumflet compyled by G.C. to master Smyth and Wyllyam G. prayenge them both for the loue of our Lorde, to growe at last to an honest accorde.
author: G. C.
publisher: Imprynted at London by Rycharde Bankes. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. And be to sell [sic] in Pater noster rowe at the signe of the Roose,
notes: Initials in the title have sometimes been misread as G.L.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
